reviews.title: Its good!
reviews.comment: Indian flute calms me down instantly. Its my favorite of all the sound aps because of it.

reviews.title: Five Star App!!
reviews.comment: Haven\'t slept without it since I purchased it. The perfect sound app for anyone that can\'t sleep when it\'s quiet. I set the timer for an hour but have never made it past 15 minutes.
reviews.author: Dola King

reviews.title: Harsh
reviews.comment: The sounds are nice but... there are harsh loud bursts that alert you when you are trying to relax or fall asleep. Examples: the beach noises are nice until a loud wave crashes and wakes you up. Also, Thunder crashing during a nice rain storm. The Thunder is too close to be \"relaxing\". This sounds like I am being weird, I know, but this just did not relax me like other nature sounds have in the past.
reviews.author: Brendan Hawkins

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: Most natural sounding app I\'ve looked for, and I\'ve gone thru quite a few lol.
